channel.title: Hugo on Al3xis.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Al3xis.xyz

item.title: Quickguide - Hugo | Git | Netlify setup
item.description: This is a simple guide/cheatsheet with all the steps and commands to take you from nothing to a FREE published website with Hugo, GitHub and Netlify!

item.title: Setting Up Disqus Comments in Hugo
item.description: This guide applies to Hugo themes, such as the PaperMod theme. Depending on your Hugo theme, setting up Disqus or other comment services can differ but it will be very similar to this.
